statements: SELECT * FROM ItemMenu ORDER BY ItemID DESC;
SELECT ItemName, ItemPrice FROM ItemMenu WHERE ItemType = 'Main Course';
SELECT ItemName, ItemPrice FROM ItemMenu WHERE ItemPrice < 10 ORDER BY ItemPrice ASC;
SELECT ItemName, ItemType FROM ItemMenu WHERE ItemName LIKE '%Pizza%';
SELECT DISTINCT ItemType FROM ItemMenu;
SELECT * FROM ItemMenu WHERE price <= 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, price FROM ItemMenu WHERE category = 'Main Course' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM ItemMenu WHERE category = 'Dessert' AND price >= 5 ORDER BY price ASC, name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM ItemMenu
SELECT name, category FROM ItemMenu WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY category, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM popular_menu_items;
SELECT item_name, item_category, sales_count FROM popular_menu_items ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
SELECT item_name, sales_count FROM popular_menu_items WHERE item_category = 'Dessert';
SELECT change_id, change_description, changed_by FROM menu_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM menu_changes WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM popular_menu_items ORDER BY sales_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM popular_menu_items WHERE item_category = 'Beverages';
SELECT change_description, changed_by, change_date FROM menu_changes WHERE changed_by LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM popular_menu_items WHERE sales_count > 100 ORDER BY item_category, item_name;
SELECT item_name, item_category, sales_count FROM popular_menu_items WHERE item_category IN ('Appetizers', 'Desserts') ORDER BY item_category, sales_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM MenuItems ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM MenuItems WHERE price > 10;
SELECT item_name, price, item_id FROM MenuItems WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE quantity >= 5;
SELECT order_id, item_id, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM MenuItems ORDER BY item_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MenuItems WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM MenuItems JOIN Orders ON MenuItems.item_id = Orders.item_id GROUP BY item_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.quantity, MenuItems.item_name FROM Orders JOIN MenuItems ON Orders.item_id = MenuItems.item_id
SELECT report_id, item_id, total_orders, last_updated FROM Reports WHERE total_orders >= 10 ORDER BY last_updated
SELECT * FROM MenuItems;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM MenuItems WHERE item_category = 'Main Course';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT order_date, quantity, total_price FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price, total_sales FROM MenuItems JOIN Reports ON MenuItems.item_id = Reports.item_id;
SELECT * FROM MenuItems ORDER BY item_price DESC, item_name ASC, item_category
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM MenuItems WHERE item_category = 'Main Course' OR item_category = 'Dessert'

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, MenuItems.item_name, Orders.quantity FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.order_id INNER JOIN MenuItems ON Orders.item_id = MenuItems.item_id
SELECT report_date, total_sales, total_orders FROM Reports WHERE total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Customers.customer_email, Orders.order_date, MenuItems.item_name, Orders.quantity, Orders.total_price FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id INNER JOIN MenuItems ON Orders.item_id = MenuItems.item_id WHERE Customers.customer_id = 101
SELECT * FROM MenuItems;
SELECT item_name, item_price, item_category FROM MenuItems WHERE item_price > 15;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM Feedback WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT report_id, report_date, popular_item_id, total_orders FROM Reports WHERE total_orders > 50 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MenuItems ORDER BY item_name ASC, item_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM MenuItems WHERE item_category='Main Course';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT item_name, item_price, item_category FROM MenuItems JOIN Orders ON MenuItems.item_id = Orders.item_id WHERE Orders.quantity > 5;
SELECT item_name, rating, comments FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
